members.name: getPreferredLanguage
members.description: Returns the BCP-47 compliant language identifier tag to the successCallback with a properties object as a parameter. That object should have a value property with a String value.

members.name: getLocaleName
members.description: Returns the BCP 47 compliant locale identifier string to the successCallback with a properties object as a parameter.

params.name: options
params.description: Options for the converted date. Length, selector.

members.name: stringToDate
members.description: Parses a date formatted as a string, according to the client's user preferences and calendar using the time zone of the client, and returns the corresponding date object.

params.name: dateString
params.description: Date as a string to be converted

params.name: options
params.description: Options for the converted date. Length, selector.

members.name: getDatePattern
members.description: Returns a pattern string to format and parse dates according to the client's user preferences.

params.name: options
params.description: Object with the format length and selector

members.name: getDateNames
members.description: Returns an array of the names of the months or days of the week, depending on the client's user preferences and calendar.

params.name: options
params.description: Object with type (narrow or wide) and item (month or days).

members.name: isDayLightSavingsTime
members.description: Indicates whether daylight savings time is in effect for a given date using the client's time zone and calendar.

members.name: getFirstDayOfWeek
members.description: Returns the first day of the week according to the client's user preferences and calendar.

members.name: numberToString
members.description: Returns a number formatted as a string according to the client's user preferences.

params.name: options
params.description: Object with property `type` that can be set to: decimal, percent, or currency.

params.name: stringToConvert
params.description: String you want to conver to a number

params.name: options
params.description: The type of number you want to return. Can be decimal, percent, or currency.

members.name: getNumberPattern
members.description: Returns a pattern string to format and parse numbers according to the client's user preferences.

params.name: options
params.description: Can be decimal, percent, or currency.

members.name: getCurrencyPattern
members.description: Returns a pattern string to format and parse currency values according to the client's user preferences and ISO 4217 currency code.
